events.message: We have received the application for the Software Engineer position from the candidate and the resume looks promising with relevant experience in full-stack development.
The application has been categorized under Engineering based on the candidate's skills and background in software development and system architecture.
A recruiter with technical expertise in engineering roles has been assigned to manage the candidate's application and facilitate the recruitment process.
Initial screening call was completed successfully with the candidate, discussing their engineering experience, technical skills, and career interests in detail.
The candidate responded promptly and positively to follow-up questions about their engineering projects and expressed enthusiasm for the upcoming technical interview.
A technical interview with the engineering panel has been scheduled for the candidate to assess coding skills, problem-solving ability, and system design knowledge.
